title: freezing in loading screen
body: So for quite some time now, since patch 6.14 I have been freezing in the loading screen, after champ select and before the actual game. I was wondering if anyone has a solution to my problem. I am able to load the portraits but i'm unable to load into the game. My percentage can go to 100 but i still wont load into the actual game. I've turned off the Xbox game DVR but that hasn't changed anything.

replies.body: Are you receiving any error messages?  What do you see on the loading screen before it freezes?  I'm thinking that there may be a driver or file problem that's failing to render the game.  TO know for sure, I recommend going over the instructions in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  Hope that helps, but let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZQE2PcL3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-26T22:47:45.034+0000)

I wasn't/aren't getting any sort of error message. and while the game loaded it looked completely normal. There wasn't any sort fo bug splat's or anything. I would notice that my ping would stop moving at one point then see that my percentage wasn't moving either. Thank you for replying and I will be looking at the game crash guide.
